Posts.Title: Radiotherapy fit breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi there, i think it all depends on how the radiotherapy affects you, mostly in terms of tiredness. I had a best friend who worked in an office in the morning, had her rads at lunchtime, and rested in the afternoon. She coped with this fine. But my sister, who is a hairdresser and Â on her feet all day was wiped out by her rads after a week and couldn’t carry on. I’m hoping for the best and that I’m not too tired, but I won’t beat myself up if I do need to rest. We are coping with a lot, physically and mentally and we need to be kind to ourselves. All the very best with the rest of your journey xx
